attr.complications: abortion, stillbirths, muscle contractures, arthrogryposis, death

reference: Dubey, J. P., Schares, G., & Ortega-Mora, L. M. (2007). Epidemiology and control of neosporosis and Neospora caninum. Clinical microbiology reviews, 20(2), 323-367.

attr.mechanism of action: intracellular parasite with complex life cycle

reference: Dubey, J. P., Schares, G., & Ortega-Mora, L. M. (2007). Epidemiology and control of neosporosis and Neospora caninum. Clinical microbiology reviews, 20(2), 323-367.

attr.age group: all ages, puppies more severely affected

reference: Dubey, J. P., Schares, G., & Ortega-Mora, L. M. (2007). Epidemiology and control of neosporosis and Neospora caninum. Clinical microbiology reviews, 20(2), 323-367.
